name: Khana Indian Grill
description: Offers a modern take on Indian cooking with a lean menu featuring snacks, rice dishes, rolls, and combo plates. They specifically mention "Bengali Shrimp" on their menu

name: Bay Leaf Indian Cuisine
description: Offers a fusion of Indian and Indo-Chinese cuisine, aiming to exceed expectations with fine cuisine and exceptional service

name: Isha The Taste of India
description: Serves freshly prepared Indian delicacies with authentic spices and traditional cooking methods

name: Taj Mahal
description: A locally owned and operated restaurant serving fresh and delicious Indian dishes, aiming to provide an amazing experience

name: Curry House Indian Kitchen
address: 9700 N Rodney Parham Rd, Little Rock, AR 72207
description: Known for authentic Indian cuisine with flavorful dishes like butter chicken, lamb vindaloo, and garlic naan, offering a cozy ambiance and friendly service

name: BananaLeaf Indian Cuisine
address: 11121 N Rodney Parham Rd Suite 104, Little Rock, AR 72212
description: Offers a variety of Indian dishes, including chicken tikka masala, chicken briyani, and spicy chicken vindaloo

name: Bawarchi Biryanis
address: 11121 N Rodney Parham Rd Suite 104, Little Rock, AR 72212
description: Focuses on authentic Hyderabadi Biryani and other Indian cuisine, with a passion for customer service and high-quality food
